content.full_text:
Security Bond for Strother G. Jones, 10 August 18431 NOWif the saidS G Jonesshall well and truly discharge the duties of said Office, by serving all processes

legally to him directed, pay over all monies which may come to his hands by virtue

thereof, and do and perform all things appertaining thereunto, then this obligation

to be void and of non-effect, otherwise to remain in full force. Signed, sealed and delivered on the day and date above.
paragraphs: Security Bond for Strother G. Jones, 10 August 18431 NOWif the saidS G Jonesshall well and truly discharge the duties of said Office, by serving all processes
legally to him directed, pay over all monies which may come to his hands by virtue
thereof, and do and perform all things appertaining thereunto, then this obligation
to be void and of non-effect, otherwise to remain in full force. Signed, sealed and delivered on the day and date above.

footnotes.text:
1Noah W. Matheny filled in the blanks on this partially-printed document. Abraham Lincoln
                  signed his own name only. John C. Doremas and James Douglass signed their names.

NOWif the saidS G Jonesshall well and truly discharge the duties of said Office, by serving all processes
                  legally to him directed, pay over all monies which may come to his hands by virtue
                  thereof, and do and perform all things appertaining thereunto, then this obligation

Signed, sealed and delivered on the day and date above.
